scenario_text.value:
(After getting the key from Jijimon, we left
the park and returned to the school,)

(in part because it was too late to try the
waterway, but mostly because...)

(...we were exhausted. Especially Miu, who
fell asleep just as soon as we got back.)

(Her relief at having Kaito by her side again
probably had something to do with it.)
(As for me...)
Could we...really go back?
Takuma? You’re not going to sleep?
Oh, Agumon! Sorry, did I wake you?
No, I’ve been up.
Something on your mind, Takuma?
I guess you could say that.

It’s more like, now that I know there might
really be a way for us to go home...
...I’m kind of excited.

Oh, so that’s it! Everyone did seem pretty
lively at dinner!
Yeah, I guess they did.

Minoru kept going on and on about finally
being able to read comics again.

Uh-huh. Then everyone fell asleep not long
after we ate.
Yeah, they all worked really hard today!
They sure did.
But I think you worked harder than anyone!
You do?

Absolutely! You’re really something else,
Takuma! I’m proud to be your partner!

(I don’t know what it is, but hearing Agumon
say that really warms my heart.)

Well, I’m proud to be your partner, too,
Agumon!
Oh, that makes me so happy! Thanks, Takuma!
Haha, you’re welcome.
Oh... You two are still up?
Hm? Aoi? Oh, and Labramon too.

Looked like you were having a nice
conversation. What were you talking about?
That’s top secret!

Only me and Takuma get to know!
Right, Takuma?
Yeah, right. I guess.

(Besides, I’d feel a little embarrassed
telling Aoi and Labramon what we said.)

Anyway, what brings you two here? I thought
you were both sound asleep.

Oh, I don’t know, probably the same thing
that brought you here.
Makes sense.

I think somewhere deep down I’ve always had
this anxiety that maybe we’ll never go back.

So now that it’s looking like there’s a real
chance we’ll go home, it’s a huge relief.

Only now there’s this new anxiety that maybe
we won’t be able to make it happen.

Don’t worry, Aoi! I’m sure we can do it.
I know we can!
Me too!

And if you can’t figure it out right away,
we’ll be there to help you until you do!

Yeah. With you and the others helping,
Agumon, I’m sure things will work out.
I bet you’re right.

Besides, we’ve got you, Takuma, and everyone
else too.
Me? What’s so special about me?

You know, I don’t think we could’ve gotten
through today without you, Takuma.

I feel like...just having you around is going
to be a huge help to us all.

So keep on being someone we can rely on,
Takuma!
Uh... Er, um...

Hee hee, what do you say, Labramon? Ready to
get some sleep?
Sounds great!
Okay, good night, you two.
G-good night...
Takuma, your whole face is red. Are you okay?
T-totally fine!

I, uh, I think we’d better get some sleep
too! Okay?!

(I wasn’t expecting Aoi to say anything like
that!)

(Anyway, I’d better rest up to make sure I’m
ready for tomorrow.)

What’re you two up to, staring at each other
like that?
Huh? We were just talking.
That’s right!

Uh-huh. If I didn’t know any better, I’d say
you two had fallen for each other!
I don’t know what you’re talking about.

Minoru, you have an odd way of expressing
yourself sometimes.
It is not one of your more admirable traits.
Sheesh, all I ever get from you is lectures!

Come on, give me a break. I’m just lettin’
off some steam.

Oh, were you having trouble sleeping because
you were so excited?
Bingo! Got it in one, Takuma! Way to go!
The way you look? It wasn’t hard to guess.
I get it, though.
Takuma said he felt the same way!
Hey, Agumon! Don’t give me away like that!
Haha! Sounds like you’re in the same boat!
Well, who wouldn’t be?

We’ve got so much to hope for, but what if it
doesn’t work out? My mind just keeps racing.
Same here!

Still, I really do think if we all stick
together, we’ll get through this.

All right, Takuma! Put up a hand! As high as
it’ll go!
What?
Come on! Victory high five!

Victory? If you wish to raise your spirits
for tomorrow, isn’t that a bit premature?

No way! We’re gonna get the info we need and
make it back safe! Victory is ours!
Yeah!

Well, I hope that spirit gets both of you
through tomorrow.
I’m gonna give it everything I got, too!

Yeah! We’ll be counting on you, Agumon,
Falcomon!

Now we had better get some rest, to be sure
we have enough energy for tomorrow.

Good point. And I think I’m finally starting
to feel tired.
Yeah, we’ll head to bed too.

(After all, tomorrow is going to be a very
big day for us.)
Huh? What’re you two still doin’ up?!
Oh, hey Ryo, Kunemon.
Kew!
Hey there, Kunemon!

Why haven’t you gone to bed already? We gotta
be up early tomorrow.

I dunno, I’m too worked up for sleep. Just
thinking how we might be able to go home...
Yeah, I hear ya.

Huh, you don’t seem too excited. I thought
you wanted to get back more than anyone.
’Course I do. It’s just...

We gotta bust in on enemy territory, right?
I’m not so sure about that.
You scared?

Heh, not big on sugar coating things, are
you? But yeah, it does freak me out.

Well, I can understand why you’d feel that
way, but—

Nah, it’s cool. Sure, I’m scared. Scared
enough that I’d rather just run away, but...

...as long as Kunemon’s with me, I feel like
things’ll work out.
Kew?

It’s something I realized back then... When
Kunemon saved me from that Kenzoku monster.

When this little guy’s desperate, he can be
really strong. So I thought, why not me too?
Kewn!
Hmph! Not like I meant that as a compliment.

Oh, and...I guess I never did thank you for
saving me.
So...thanks. I...really appreciate it.
Sure...
Wow, you’ve really changed, Ryo!
Shut up! Don’t you look at me like that!
Man, now I’m exhausted! I’m going to bed!

Ryo was so scared of Kunemon. I never
would’ve thought they’d end up like that.

I hope Shuuji and Lopmon can learn to get
along like them, too.
Yeah, that’d be nice.
Huh? You two are still up?!
Oh, hey there, Saki, Floramon.
What are you two up to?

We’re not really up to anything. Just talking
about tomorrow.
Hey! That’s just what we’ve been doing!
Haha, sounds like great minds think alike!

Are you...feeling nervous about tomorrow,
Saki?
What gives you that idea?

Well, sometimes when you seem really excited,
you’re actually nervous about something.

Wow, that’s a good observation, Takuma! How’d
you know?

You got your eye on me or something? I mean,
you must, to pick up on something like that.

What?! No! I... I didn’t mean to imply
anything like that!

Hahaha, I was just kidding! You get so
flustered whenever I tease you like that.
(Ugh... I feel so embarrassed.)
But...I am kinda glad, I guess.

Yeah, yeah, I’m sure you’re just teasing me
again. Very funny.
No, this time I mean it.

Like...it’s nice to have someone who really
tries to understand you.
You know what I mean?

I sure do! I love it when Takuma’s really
attentive and tries to understand me!

Same here. I want Saki to learn more about
me, and I want to learn more about her too.
Heheh, thanks, Floramon.

But I think it’s about time we got to sleep.
Tomorrow’s going to be a big day!

It sure is. We’d better be getting to bed,
too.
Oh? Then good night!

(I hope...I was able to make Saki feel
a little less anxious.)

Takuma? Aren’t you going back? I thought we
were going to bed.
Oh, right! We’d better rest up for tomorrow.
Takuma, do you have a minute?
Sure. What is it, Shuuji?
I wanted to apologize to you.

What? Why? I...can’t think of anything you’d
need to apologize for.
I...had to rely on you a lot today, you know?

I realize that as the oldest one here, that
wasn’t really acceptable. I’m sorry.
Oh, but, I didn’t mind at all.

Still, I feel like I have to take
responsibility.
Any less would make me a failure as a leader.

(Shuuji takes his responsibilities so
seriously.)
Well, if you insist. Apology accepted.
Sorry to take up your time.

It’s fine! Let’s just hope tomorrow goes
well!
Yes, let’s hope.

There’s no telling what dangers we’ll face
tomorrow. I’ll have to look out for everyone.
Be careful not to stay up too late, you two.
Right! We won’t!

Looks like Shuuji and Lopmon still won’t be
sleeping anywhere near each other.

Yeah... I really hope Shuuji’s able to open
up soon.
If only they could get along like we do!
Yeah, if only.
Well, I think we’d better get some sleep now.
There’s going to be a lot to do tomorrow.
Hey, what’re you two doin’?
Oh, it’s Kaito and Dracmon!
’Sup.
Hm? Something smells tasty...
Oh, yeah, you’re right.

Well, I was feelin’ kinda hungry. That’s what
woke me up.

You mean you got up for a snack? Don’t let
Aoi catch you.
Yeah, keep this quiet, okay?

She can be downright fierce when she gets
mad.
Ahaha, yeah.

So, how’s Miu? She fell asleep pretty soon
after we got back.

She did. She’s not injured or anything, so
I don’t think anything’s wrong, but...

...for all she went on about how fun that
amusement park was and how she wanted...

...to stay there with everyone, being on her
own must’ve been stressful.
Yeah. I really am glad we found her.
So, look... Thanks for everything.
Huh?

I just...feel like I leaned on you guys a lot
today.

What’s this? Kaito being open and honest
about how feels for once? No way!
Pretty hard to believe!
Oh, shut up, both of you!

But...seriously, I don’t think we’d have
found her if it wasn’t for you, Takuma.
So...thanks!

Oh come on, you helped us as much as we
helped you.
And we’ll really be counting on you tomorrow!
Heh... Haha! Then leave it to me!
And me! Don’t count me out.
Oh, me too! Me too!
Right, I’ll be counting on both of you.

Well, I’d better be gettin’ to bed.
Tomorrow’s gonna be a tough one.
Yeah. We’d better rest up.
